mathjax

$$ L_{l}^{(i)} (s) = \left[\sum_{s_{j}} \text{Prob} (s_j \mid s, v_j) L_{j}^{(i)}(s_j) \right] \times \left[\sum_{s_{k}} \text{Prob} (s_k \mid s, v_k) L_{k}^{(i)}(s_k) \right] $$

with code highlighting

def f(L,tp,j,k,l):
    for sl,ll in enumerate(L[l]):
        llj = sum([ lj * tp[l,j,sl,sj] for sj,lj in enumerate(L[j]) ])
        llk = sum([ lk * tp[l,k,sl,sk] for sk,lk in enumerate(L[k]) ])
        L[l,sl] = llj * llk
